Mediator for generating a project database from local project and component jar resources User: jhumphrey Date: Dec 12, 2007

Constructor Detail

DatabaseGenerator

public DatabaseGenerator(Connection connection,
                         List<ComponentJar> componentJars,
                         Map<String,net.java.util.Version> databaseVersions,
                         ProjectContext pCtx,
                         ComponentJarService cjs)
Parameters:
connection - The JDBC connection to use when connecting to the database. doesn't. This is used to determine if hibernate should be used to create the tables. If the project doesn't have any domain objects than we must assume that all the domain objects come from the classpath. If this is true, than we can check to see if there are create scripts in the path.
componentJars - a list of all component jars
databaseVersions - the versions of all componenets current stored in the database
pCtx - ProjectContext object that contains information related to the project
cjs - ComponentJarService

              throws IOException
